item.title: How to build a power controller
item.description: Things you need Raspberry Pi. Both Pi zero or Pi 3 will work Relays, any type of relay that can support 110v or 220v AC outlets using 5 volt logic will work. Remember Solid State Relays run longer than mechanical relays. Number of channels in relay will limit how many outlets you can have Jumper wires 5v 2.5 amp micro usb power supply for raspberry pi Unviersal powe chord Power socket with fuse AC receptacles Wiring Configuring reef-pi Declare outlets Restart reef-pi Configure high relay
